name: Dungeon Survival (itch)
description:
Dungeon Survival is a platform shooter game where you kill robots by firing bullets or by throwing your own gun. This game is made for GDN Cherry Jam.

Controls:-

Arrow keys to move and jump.

Left click to shoot bullets

Right click to throw your gun and injure enemy.

The goal is as simple as killing the robots.

I have a question please reply @ https://goo.gl/MKQnjx
